AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Raymond McMillon: defendant identified as the person motioning for aliens to hide, wore white clothing and a blinking cellular Bluetooth Device during the incident, argued against conspiracy conviction
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Zeba Williams: individual allegedly transporting aliens with McMillon, stopped at an empty parking lot where aliens were waiting, co-conspirator in the case
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Ramon De La Cruz: unlawful alien testifying at trial, identified McMillon as the person motioning for them to hide, arranged to pay thousands of dollars to be smuggled into the United States
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Jorge Miguel Hernandez-Gomez: unlawful alien testifying at trial, identified McMillon as the person motioning for them to hide, arranged to pay thousands of dollars to be smuggled into the United States
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Eric Camacho: Border Patrol Agent testifying about how aliens or their families commonly pay smugglers indirectly
